name: So Damned
content: 第一次见你 我就对你倾心
我听见你对我的呼唤 并想要去探索
你对我的每次触碰只会增加我对你的渴望
而现在我不得不去想 我所有的爱是为了什么
What happened to my fairy tale
我的童话故事是怎么了
You shot it all to hell
Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
Now that she’s the one you hit
Player you thought you had me fooled
Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
Now tell ‘em how we messed up
我们怎么会闹到这个地步
Te;t rock you like i can
然后你会很快发现自己不过是她的
What goes around comes back and i can’t
过去的情景又重现 而我
因为你回头的时候已经是我的过去
What happened to my fairy tale
我的童话故事是怎么了
You shot it all to hell
Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
Now that she’s the one you hit
Player you thought you had me fooled
Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
Every night you scream her name
每天晚上你喊着她的名字
Say i love you without shame
却毫无愧疚对我说着我爱你
And don’t tell her you’ll do the same
Cause to you it’s one big game
因为对你而言 这只是一场游戏
I refuse to let this pain
Keep on running through my veins
My revenge is in the air
Close your eyes and say your prayers
Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
Now that she’s the one you hit
Player you thought you had me fooled
Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
Now that she’s the one you hit

Cause i saw you with your *
因为我看到你和你的坏女孩在一起
